lead_paragraph: KLINGENSTEIN--Diane S. (Dee), died at her home in Maine on May 22, 2016 comforted by her children. Born to Charles W. and Emily W. Stinchfield of Grosse Pointe, MI, her education included receiving diplomas from the Ethel Walker School and Sarah Lawrence College. Then it was on to New York to attend Columbia's School of Social Work while also employed doing social work. In New York she met her husband Bernard Klingenstein (Bud). Married in 1950, they began life together in Purchase, NY. Here they had their three children. Dee's interests, besides her devotion to family were athletics, literature and philanthropy. Dee was predeceased by her husband Bud (2012) and her brothers Charles (1933) and Robert (1994). She is survived by her children Chuck, Geoff and Ginger; their spouses (respectively) Sarah, Alixandra and Michael; two grandchildren; two great-grandchildren as well as her brother-in-law Lee. In lieu of flowers, donations in memory of Dee may be made to either Berea College, C.P.O. 2216, Berea, KY 40404 or the Animal Refuge League of Greater Portland, P.O. Box 336, Westbrook, ME 04098. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KLINGENSTEIN, DIANE S
